AmmoCategoryDef.label: charge
AmmoCategoryDef.description: The charged particle coating disrupts armor and tissue in equal measure.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: concentrated charge
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Focuses charged particles around the tip of the core for improved armor penetration at the cost of stopping power.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: ion charge
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the round creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: incendiary
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with incendiary agent that ignites after impact.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: thermobaric
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosive aerosol that causes a large explosion and ignites flammable materials.

AmmoCategoryDef.label: foam
AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round designed for civilian fire-fighting purposes. Filled with fire-retardant foam to suppress fires in a large area.
